widget.name: Focus Manager
widget.description: You can use this widget to set the visibility of an item based on a microflow

property.caption: Focus events
property.description: Allows you to configure an event that changes user focus

property.caption: Event
property.description: The event you wish to subscribe to. For a list of events see jQuery documentation (http://api.jquery.com/category/events/event-handler-attachment/).

property.caption: Listened object
property.description: Object(s) listened, please use selectors for this field (http://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css_selectors.asp). For example: .mx-button

property.caption: Focus target
property.description: Object to be targeted, please use a selector that returns a single object.

property.caption: Condition
property.description: Optional, allows conditional focus. For details please see the documentation.
